attributes.action: reduce the amount that university students pay for their courses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Are you a student like me??
Are YOU paying £3000 a year for 12 hours a week of study??
Do You Think Its really Worth it, where a year ago students only paid £1800??
If you agree, then sign up now to reduce the amount that we pay!!
